name: FlappyGriffon
description: FlappyGriffon is the ultimate Flappy Bird remake that will test your skills and challenge your reflexes. With stunning graphics and smooth gameplay, you'll guide a majestic griffon through a series of obstacles as you attempt to beat your high score. The game features challenging and addictive gameplay, colorful art, and an immersive experience that will keep you coming back for more. Whether you're a casual gamer or a hardcore player, FlappyGriffon will keep you entertained for hours. So, are you ready to take on the challenge? Download FlappyGriffon now and see how far you can fly!
